channel.title: [pi] undroppable items while killed in pvp
channel.description:
how can i add an undropable pvp item? i see that it stops you from killing yourself when your on same ip address... i might need to put it ther ebut not sure
atm firecape drops on death and i dont want it to

item.title: [pi] undroppable items while killed in pvp
item.dc:creator: @Mi_K_ey Mi K ey
item.description:
@Mi_K_ey wrote:

Search in Config.java

heres mine…

public static final int[] UNDROPPABLE_ITEMS 	= 	{295,10735,7592,7593,7594,7595,7596,3483,3485,3486,3488,1052,10734,9244,9243,9144}; // what items can't be dropped

just fix it to
